name: Confirmation Popup Validation Test
description: The test sets the value in the field. After approval, by clicking on the save button, the popup window, the title, the text in it, and the buttons are validated
descriptionHtml: The test sets the value in the field. After approval, by clicking on the save button, the popup window, the title, the text in it, and the buttons are validated
